isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - C.B. Radio Accommodation Pkg.

svcproc.title: C.B. Radio Accommodation Pkg.
svcproc.para: Refer to RADIO - CB ACCOMMODATION PACKAGE circuit diagram in CTS-5119S. This option provides an accessory power CB radio connection. The circuit is protected by 10A fuse F5-B and the connection is grounded through to the right dash ground stud. An external speaker is also provided.
